channel.title: I need abit of expert help
channel.description:
ok today i have been looking around to make my own rs2 server, and i have made a server from a difference source than this forum and it has a login screen with no password field, just username and IP.. it has no npcs or anything so its pretty lame...
i know some of the admin commands like ::item iemID and ::myposs ::tele 6478,43344 and i have spawned myself some armour to test this....
anyway i treid getting a server from here (because its better from what my freind tells me) and i registerd at no-ip.com, but i got stuck after the JDK link would not work.... i tried the video and the forum has been moved/delected so i cant follow the indtructions.
i would like to host a server with a password feild and be able to import/add npcs and be able to attack monsters and other things.... please can somebody help me i been trying to get a proper rs2 server for weeks now :(

item.title: I need abit of expert help
item.dc:creator: @akaudead akaudead
item.description:
@akaudead wrote:

i need to know how to make some1 mod or admin…im an admin on odion.no-ip.info and i cant make peeps mod or items…any1 know command?

Read full topic
item.source: I need abit of expert help

item.title: I need abit of expert help
item.dc:creator: @Slyte Slyte
item.description:
@Slyte wrote:

Send me your E-Mail in Private Message, and ill send you step by step, the JDK link does not work, but i will tell you everything. Also if your looking for a working source, with attackable NPC’S tradable NPC’S working commands , than ill hook you up with my source, not really mine, but what i created

Read full topic
